name: Octagon 2: Extreme Evolution
description:
Sequel of the very successful Octagon game from 2013 is pulling you back to the megaplex of hallways, platforms, obstacles and gaps. The Octagon has grown up and become faster, more complex and very challenging. Can you survive the maddest of mad races?

Octagon is a minimal arcade game where you have to move fast or be left behind. As the floor moves beneath you, spin your world around to dodge speed bumps. An energizing soundtrack by award winning Jessica Kelly keeps you in the zone on your race to the finish. But with each round over after just 60 seconds, only super-fast reflexes will beat this very challenging game.

Features:
- 3 game modes that pull in everyone, doesn’t matter if you are an experienced player or new to this game
- Procedural design and graphics are offering unlimited number of levels
- Original soundtrack by Jessica Kelly
- Universal App with iCloud syncing
- Pure challenge for one price, pay once and play forever!

Tell me if you love it or hate it at info@lukaskorba.com or follow me at @lukaskorba.
